def_en: Froth is a mass of small bubbles on the surface of a liquid.
If a liquid froths, small bubbles appear on its surface.

def_cn: (因非常愤怒或激动而)嘴喷唾沫，口吐白沫
def_en: If you say that someone is frothing, or that they are frothing at the mouth, you are emphasizing that they are very angry or excited about something.

def_cn: 迷人但没有实际价值的事物;虚浮的东西
def_en: If you refer to an activity or object as froth, you disapprove of it because it appears exciting or attractive, but has very little real value or importance.
